forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 84, with temperatures falling to around 81 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 71. Southwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
